articles.author: Pedram Javaheri, CNN
articles.title: Over two feet of rain fell in Italy in only half a day, something not seen in Europe before - CNN
articles.description: Extreme, climate-fueled rainfall broke records this week in a part of Italy known for its rain and an area in Oman not known for rain at all.
